SEARCH
Package com.example.eventease.model

Class Event

java.lang.Object
com.example.eventease.model.Event
public class Event extends Object
Represents an event in the EventEase system. Contains event details including title, location, capacity, waitlist, and admitted entrants.

  • Field Summary

      Returns:
